sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ion-grid>
        <ion-row>
            <circle-traffic-light :color="color.top.background" :borderColor="color.top.border" :shadow="color.top.shadow"></circle-traffic-light>
        </ion-row>
        <ion-row>
            <circle-traffic-light :color="color.middle.background" :borderColor="color.middle.border" :shadow="color.middle.shadow"></circle-traffic-light>
        </ion-row>
        <ion-row>
            <circle-traffic-light :color="color.bottom.background" :borderColor="color.bottom.border" :shadow="color.bottom.shadow"></circle-traffic-light>
        </ion-row>
    </ion-grid>
</template>
<script>
import {IonGrid, IonRow} from '@ionic/vue'
import CircleTrafficLight from './Circle.vue'
export default {
    props: ['status'],
    components:{
        IonGrid,
        IonRow,
        CircleTrafficLight
    },
    data(){
        return{
            color: {
                top:{background:"",border:"", shadow: ["0px", "black"]},
                middle:{background:"",border:"", shadow: ["0px", "black"]},
                bottom:{background:"",border:"", shadow: ["0px", "black"]}
            }
        }
    },
    watch:{
        status: function(){
            if(this.status == 1){
                this.color = {top:{background:"#ec1e3a",border:"#ec1e3a", shadow: ["20px", "#ec1e3a" ]}, middle:{background:"#ffe590",border:"#ffc409", shadow: ["3px","grey"]}, bottom:{background:"#a3eec1",border:"#2dd36f", shadow: ["3px","grey"]}}
            }
            else if (this.status == 2){
                this.color = {top:{background:"#e48592",border:"#ec1e3a", shadow: ["3px","grey"]}, middle:{background:"#ffc409",border:"#ffc409", shadow: ["20px","#ffc409"]}, bottom:{background:"#a3eec1",border:"#2dd36f", shadow: ["3px","grey"]}}
            }
            else if (this.status == 3){
                this.color = {top:{background:"#e48592",border:"#ec1e3a", shadow: ["3px","grey"]}, middle:{background:"#ffe590",border:"#ffc409", shadow: ["3px","grey"]}, bottom:{background:"#2dd36f",border:"#2dd36f", shadow: ["20px","#2dd36f"]}}
            }
            else {
                this.color = {top:{background:"#ec1e3a",border:"#ec1e3a", shadow: ["20px", "#ec1e3a"]}, middle:{background:"#ffc409",border:"#ffc409", shadow: ["20px","#ffc409"]}, bottom:{background:"#2dd36f",border:"#2dd36f", shadow: ["20px","#2dd36f"]}}
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>

</style>
